item.title: Illustrator-1: How to vectorise art work with illustrator FAST!
item.author: michtintin
item.description: How to vectorise art work with illustrator FAST! Introduction. 00:00-0:07 Hi Everyone. Today I’m going to show you how you can vectorise your artwork or your sketches fast with image trace from illustrator. Import image. 0:07-0:43 Let’s import our drawing. It has to be high contrast. It will be difficult for you to trace if it’s.. it’s not on a single colored background or a white colored background. Then, you click on the drawing.
